Title: Chief Operating Officer
Writer: Carrie Kemper, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Andrew Law (executive story editor), Rachele Lynn (executive story editor), Shawn Boxe (story editor), Meghan Pleticha (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, Josh Brener, Martin Starr, Kumail Nanjiani
Plot: The COO of a world class company asks to move to Pied Piper. At the same time, Richard deals with a lawsuit from the smart fridge company that Gilfoil hacked to it fridge.
